name: Procedural SciFi Environment Test
description:
An early prototype by James Albracht, and SciFi furnishings by Nathan Schultz.

This is a keyboard and mouse game.
wasd keys: walk
spacebar: jump
shift: run
ctrl: crouch

You can look closely at the reactors and doors to interact with them. Call for an extraction at the highest point outside. Extraction may take about a minute of waiting and sometimes gets stuck unfortunately. Doors are more common as you go upwards.
